thread.title: Emma Watson is a vision in white at Elle Style Awards after fans wondered where she got to
thread.title_full: Emma Watson is a vision in white at Elle Style Awards after fans wondered where she got to

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Emma Watson is a vision in white at Elle Style Awards after fans wondered where she got to
text:
Emma Watson is a vision in white at Elle Style Awards after fans wondered where she got to Fans didn't get a glimpse of the Beauty and the Beast actress on the red carpet Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now The stars are out for Elle Style Awards 2017 red carpet Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Emma Watson knows how to make quite the impression - and she stunned as she was seen backstage at the Elle Style Awards 2017 . 
The Beauty and the Beast actress wasn't amongst the stars on the red carpet before the annual ceremony on Monday night, but she still stole the show as she was pictured backstage. 
She posed in a gorgeous floor length gown designed by Dave Benett, and looked incredible as she gazed at the camera. Emma Watson backstage at the Elle Style Awards (Photo: Rex Features) Better late than never, Emma (Photo: Rex Features) 
It comes after fans had been tweeting wondering where she was after she hadn't appeared on the red carpet. 
The official Elle UK Twitter account simply urged everyone to be patient - and it was worth the wait! The Beauty and the Beast actress dazzled in the dress (Photo: Rex Features) 
The UK magazine is hosting its annual bash to honour the greatest names in categories like Inspiring Woman of the Year, British Designer of the Year, breakthrough star and many more. 
On Monday night, some famous faces and rising stars stole the spotlight on the red carpet as everyone arrived at the ceremony showing off their collective suitable sense of style. Iskra Lawrence (Photo: Splash News) Deborah Harry (Photo: Rex Features) Nick Grimshaw attending the Elle Style Awards 2017 (Photo: PA) 
While Nick Grimshaw looked very dapper in an all black suit, it was the likes of Iskra Lawrence and Debbie Harry who truly stole the show. 
Stunning model Iskra put her incredible figure on display in a curve hugging gown, while the Blondie icon made a great impression with a red and gold suit. Beth Ditto (Photo: Rex Features) Neelam Gill (Photo: WireImage) Ellie Bamber (Photo: Rex) 
The Gossip's Beth Ditto stood out in a bold floral ensemble, while Neelam Gill's red outfit was also a great look. 
Meanwhile, Ellie Bamber turned heads in a gorgeous off the shoulder layered gown, with her red locks falling down her shoulder. Stormzy (Photo: Splash) Alice Dellal (Photo: Rex) Eleanor Tomlinson (Photo: Rex Features) 
Stormzy kept it going for the men with a stylish and suave blue suit, but the ladies owned the red carpet with some toned abs stealing the show. 
Alice Dellal and Eleanor Tomlinson both stunned in very different outfits, each showing off their flat tummies.
